title: File:Buenos Aires Casa Amarilla lou.JPG
author: Lourdes Cardenal
description: Casa Amarilla (Yellow House), at Almirante Brown avenue, is the replica of the house where Admiral Brown lived, the first mariner in Argentina (Irish, as most of the first naval heroes). The building, completed in 1980, is today the site of the Historical Institute of Naval Studies, established in 1948. The landmark is located near Boca Juniors Stadium, adjacent to the club's practice field.
